url.raw: https://www.mollie.com/oauth2/authorize?client_id={{clientId}}&redirect_uri=https://example.com/mollie/connect_redirect.php&state={{$guid}}&scope=payments.read payments.write profiles.read profiles.write organizations.read onboarding.read onboarding.write payment-links.read payment-links.write orders.read orders.write subscriptions.read subscriptions.write customers.read customers.write mandates.read mandates.write shipments.read shipments.write settlements.read invoices.read refunds.read refunds.write&response_type=code&approval_prompt=auto&approval_prompt=force

query.value: payments.read payments.write profiles.read profiles.write organizations.read onboarding.read onboarding.write payment-links.read payment-links.write orders.read orders.write subscriptions.read subscriptions.write customers.read customers.write mandates.read mandates.write shipments.read shipments.write settlements.read invoices.read refunds.read refunds.write

response.name: Get access token
response.body:
{
    "access_token": "access_***",
    "expires_in": 3600,
    "token_type": "bearer",
    "scope": "payments.read payments.write profiles.read",
    "refresh_token": "refresh_***"
}

response.name: Refresh token
response.body:
{
    "access_token": "access_***",
    "expires_in": 3600,
    "token_type": "bearer",
    "scope": "payments.read payments.write profiles.read",
    "refresh_token": "refresh_***"
}
